body: Dunno what it is about aoi hitori works, the art is great but the cheating in it always turns me off and I enjoy way more extreme stuff. I think it’s because it fails at straddling the line between realism and fantasy and comes off as sad or deceitful.
@arashiyanagawa Yeah what a twist that would be if it turns out they're actually just a couple doing a kinky play
wait. the last page... Oku-san in quotation marks... that makes it sound staged. were they both just playing around with each other because they're into that?
Cheating bitches man, some pathetic SOB tells you a sad story and you throw away your marriage. Because fuck your husband right?
